reference.shortdesc: The booknumber element contains the book's form number, such as SC21-1920.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The booknumber element is specialized from data; it is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: In this example, "99F1234" is a part number assigned to this book by the publisher, while SC21-1234-00 is a number that identifies this book among all of the author's works.
